Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Nick H.
Reviews.Content: Great phone had the 4s and lost it.  I got the 4 because it is a little cheaper.  The only noticeable difference is you lose Siri.  Really no loss at all she is cool but rarely used because she rarely understands what I say unless it is a entry into my calendar. All in all I would buy the 4 again over the 4s.

Reviews.Title: Will definitely purchase from you guys again
Reviews.Author: MsBacon
Reviews.Content: Purchase an Iphone (sprint) from them and it came extremely quick and in amazing condition. I'm very pleased with this purchase especially since it was much much cheaper than getting it from the sprint store without a contract. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Aba Forewa
Reviews.Content: I'm super satisfied I got a great deal on my phone and the seller is very involved and interactive with your order so you know what's going on! They're very sweet and they're good at what they do! I have no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Replace with the same.
Reviews.Author: Everard Blissett
Reviews.Content: It's like I never replaced it. It's better and cheaper then repairing my old one and It works like it was never use.

Reviews.Title: i give it 5 stars as well
Reviews.Author: johnathan trainor
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with the item got it was the only place I looked and found the item I really wanted so thank you

Reviews.Title: Very bad experience
Reviews.Author: Edna
Reviews.Content: The seller sent the phone locked, after many failed several attempts to try to get the password from the seller I decided to return it since I wasn't able to use it.

Reviews.Title: Love It !!!
Reviews.Author: Hotchiick
Reviews.Content: No joke, this phone was brand new. No scratches or no cracks. Clean ESN took me less than a hour to switch my service. Only came with USB cord just as described in description. Took only a week to arrive. It was well packaged. $200 for a brand new iPhone 4 you can't beat that. I highly recommend . I hope this helped someone.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Corbin
Reviews.Content: I bought a used black iPhone 4. Seemed brand new when I got it. I had no problem activating it with sprint. The only issue is that my lock button is jammed just one month after getting the phone.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Jaxx
Reviews.Content: Wasnt wiped out wen i got it and the phone didnt work right and they wouldnt exchange it or anything

Reviews.Title: BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER
Reviews.Author: Trav
Reviews.Content: I never had a seller contact me to make sure that I had the right purchase for the right reasons. He also gave me so many free accessories its unbelievable. Brand new iPhone, no scratches, right out of the box. I had next day shipping for free. I recommend whatever this gentleman sells, you should buy.

ProductInfo.Features:
8 GB of internal memory
3.5" touchscreen
5MP camera with 720p HD video capture
Apple A4 processor
ProductInfo.Name: Apple iPhone 4 Black 8GB Memory Mobile Phone - (Sprint)
